alert.note: Alert for Maricopa (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued March 02 at 7:59AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of south central Arizona, including the following county, Maricopa. * WHEN...Until 1145 AM MST. * IMPACTS...Rises in small streams and normally dry washes. Some low-water crossings may be impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 759 AM MST, Media and gauge reports indicated flooding is ongoing in some normally dry washes in the advisory area. - This includes the following streams and drainages... Cave Creek, Blue Wash, Galloway Wash, Grapevine Wash, Seven Springs Wash, New River, Skunk Creek, and Deadman Wash, New River. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Far north Phoenix, north Scottsdale, New River, Cave Creek, Carefree, Desert Mountain, Anthem and Seven Springs. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
